Package io.spine.server.bus

This package contains classes and interfaces for abstract Bus.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BusFilter<E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
    The filter for the messages posted to a bus.
    EnvelopeValidator<E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
    An interface defining the validator for a MessageEnvelope.
    MessageDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,R>
    A dispatcher of a message.
    MulticastDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,I>
    Dispatches a message to several entities of the same type.
    UnicastDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,I>
    Dispatches a message to one entity.

    Verifies if required fields of a BusBuilder are set.

    MulticastBus<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope<?,M,?>,C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message>,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E,?>>
    A Bus, which delivers a single message to multiple dispatchers.
